verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a morning tweetstorm on the Russia investigation] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: misquoted] [ARG1: James Clapper] . Trump claimed the former intelligence director said , " Trump should be happy that the FBI was SPYING on his campaign , " when , in fact , Clapper said the FBI did not spy on his campaign .
